pr_title: Only show the `Geocoding Provider` column in grid view in `Geocoding Config` window

timeline.message:
Add unique index for `Geocoding Config`

In webui grid view show only the column `Geocoding Provider`

https://github.com/metasfresh/metasfresh/issues/6266

timeline.author: teosarca
